title: MCP: The Missing Link Between AI Agents and APIs
author: Richard MacManus
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) is a bridging technology for AI agents and APIs. We speak with API management vendor Speakeasy about its uses.
cntitle: MCP：AI Agent 和 API 之间缺失的环节
cndescription: 模型上下文协议 (MCP) 是一种连接 AI 代理和 API 的桥梁技术。我们与 API 管理供应商 Speakeasy 讨论了它的用途。
